basics.name: Althea Mae Kaohu R. Pittman
basics.label: Student
basics.summary:
I am a student in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the 
    University of Hawaii at Mﾄ］oa studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences. 
    My immediate goals are to graduate in Spring, 2020, and pursue a career in the military upon 
    commissioning as a second lieutenant in the Army.

education.institution: University of Hawai'i at Mﾄ］oa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Resident assistant for the Hale Wainani community
highlights:
The Resident Assistant (RA) is responsible for working closely with other 
        Student Housing Services staff members to develop and maintain positive residential 
        communities. RAs have the most frequent interaction and direct communication with 
        residential students and, as a result, have a unique opportunity to contribute to the 
        holistic development and education of residents.

Demonstrates quality leadership by stimulating interest in the recreation leaders and 
        aides for whom they are responsible. Directors will be actively involved with planning, 
        instructing, daily curriculum and all recreational activities with leaders and aides. 
        Directors will be a positive role model in mentoring staff; enforce applicable program 
        rules and regulations; and perform other related duties as required.

volunteer.summary: Member of a strong family of athletes.
highlights: Attempt to complete rigorous workouts each day of the week under a target time limit.
Challenge the body physcially and mentally by participating in a variety of classes.

awards.title: 3-year Advanced Designee Army ROTC Scholarship
awards.summary: A tuition paying scholarship awarded to me for my high potential as an officer in the Army.

awards.title: First Princess - Miss O'ahu Filipina 2018
awards.summary: Won first runner up in the Miss O'ahu Filipina 2018 scholarship pageant.
